verses.roman:
prabhu yabe snāne yāna viśveśvara-daraśane
dui-dike loka kare prabhu-vilokane

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yabe—when; snāne yāna—goes to bathe; viśveśvara-daraśane—or to see the Deity of Lord Viśveśvara; dui-dike—on two sides; loka—all the people; kare—do; prabhu-vilokane—seeing of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to take His bath in the Ganges and to see the temple of Viśveśvara, people would line up on both sides to see the Lord.
